# The `LastRunTrackingInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is used to track the last run of a set of module/function passes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class is used to track the last run of a set of module/function passes.

Invalidation are conservatively handled by the pass manager if a pass doesn&#39;t explicitly preserve the result. If we want to skip a pass, we should define a unique <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> <code><a href="#ae3d69914220ce815fe1b92211a19c8b8">PassID</a></code> to identify the pass, which is usually a pointer to a static member. If a pass has parameters, they should be stored in a struct <code>OptionT</code> with a method bool isCompatibleWith(const OptionT&amp; LastOpt) const to check compatibility.

Definition at line 46 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lastruntrackinganalysis-h">LastRunTrackingAnalysis.h</a>.
